attributes.action: Create A Pagan State In Britain
attributes.additional_details: Before the invasion of Christianity into Britain, this island was Pagan. Britain only became Christian when its inhabitants were forced to convert to Christianity. It is time to restore the old ways to this country by abolishing the ineffectual Christian state and restoring a proud efficient Pagan one, the true religion and culture of this country. Sign this petition to reverse the suffering of the indigenous peoples of this isle.
